pageSetting.title: 系统使用情况分析

attribute.value: select F_CHANGE_DAYS($jsrq$,-7) qsrq from xtb_xtcs where csmc = 'SYS_STATUS'

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $qsrq$ as qsrq,$jsrq$ as jsrq,a.jgdh,a.jgmc,a.hyrs,COALESCE(b.hyrs,0) syrs,(a.hyrs-COALESCE(b.hyrs,0)) wsyrs from ( select jg.jgmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jyjgbz,count(distinct hy.hymc) hyrs from khdx_hy hy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=jgcy.qsrq and $jsrq$<=jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh where hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and hy.hydh != 'admin' group by jg.jgmc,jg.jyjgbz,jg.jgdh ) a left join ( select jg.jgmc,count(distinct hy.hymc) hyrs from khdx_hy hy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=jgcy.qsrq and $jsrq$<=jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join xtb_yyrz yyrz on yyrz.hydh=hy.hydh where hy.khdxdh!=1 and yyrz.sjsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and yyrz.sjms like '%system/index%' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and hy.hydh != 'admin' group by jg.jgmc
) b on a.jgmc=b.jgmc where a.jgdh!='1000000' and a.jyjgbz in ('$jglb$') order by syrs,jgdh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $qsrq$ as qsrq,$jsrq$ as jsrq,a.jgdh,a.jgmc,a.hyrs,COALESCE(b.hyrs,0) syrs,(a.hyrs-COALESCE(b.hyrs,0)) wsyrs from ( select jg.jgmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jyjgbz,count(distinct hy.hymc) hyrs from khdx_hy hy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=jgcy.qsrq and $jsrq$<=jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh where hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and hy.hydh != 'admin' group by jg.jgmc,jg.jyjgbz,jg.jgdh ) a left join ( select jg.jgmc,count(distinct hy.hymc) hyrs from khdx_hy hy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=jgcy.qsrq and $jsrq$<=jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join xtb_yyrz yyrz on yyrz.hydh=hy.hydh where hy.khdxdh!=1 and yyrz.sjsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and yyrz.sjms like '%system/index%' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and hy.hydh != 'admin' group by jg.jgmc
) b on a.jgmc=b.jgmc where a.jgdh!='1000000' and a.jyjgbz in ('$jglb$') order by syrs,jgdh ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select F_CHANGE_DAYS($jsrq$,-7) qsrq from xtb_xtcs where csmc = 'SYS_STATUS'
